about_the_game:
Thie Little World Demo is a strategy-based tactical game. The demo version includes content from 2 out of the 5 factions (Humans and Undead).

Gameplay Features:

  • Random Campaigns: Each game starts with randomly generated campaign content and maps, ensuring every battle is fresh and challenging.

  • Story Maps: Maps with rich background stories, where players can progress the narrative by completing various missions.

  • Custom Campaigns: Players can design their own campaign content, including maps, enemies, and stories, enhancing creativity and replayability.

  • Custom Characters: Players can design and customize the appearance, skills, and attributes of their characters, creating unique battle heroes.

  • Multiplayer Battles and Cooperation: The game supports online battles or cooperative play with friends, allowing players to enjoy strategic competition and team collaboration.

Key Mechanics:

  • Tactical Map Layout and Operations: Players must strategically position their units and carefully control characters in turn-based combat, using terrain and skills to outmaneuver and defeat enemies.

Main Appeal:

  • Diverse Gameplay: With random campaigns, story mode, player-created content, and multiplayer interactions, the game offers a rich variety of experiences.

  • High Customization: Through custom characters and campaigns, players can create a personalized game world, enhancing immersion and replayability.

content_descriptors.notes: The battle screen includes violent elements (combat). Does not contain sexual assault/non-consensual sex, BDSM, drug/alcohol abuse, and/or self-harm.

  • OS: windows 10/11
  • Processor: AMD Ryzen5 2400/Intel i3 4170

The demo version includes content from 2 out of the 5 factions available in the full game.
